name: unconfirmed-event-notification-request
description: Represents a BACnet unconfirmed event notification request, used to report alarm and event information without requiring acknowledgment.

fields.name: process-identifier
fields.description: The process identifier for the event notification.

fields.name: initiating-device-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the device initiating the notification.

fields.name: event-object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object where the event occurred.

fields.name: notification-class
fields.description: The notification class for the event.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: The priority of the event notification.

fields.name: event-type
fields.description: The type of event being reported.

fields.name: message-text
fields.description: Optional text message describing the event.

fields.name: notify-type
fields.description: The notification type (e.g., alarm, event, or acknowledgment).

fields.name: ack-required
fields.description: Indicates if acknowledgment is required. Optional.

fields.name: from-state
fields.description: The previous state before the event. Optional.

fields.name: to-state
fields.description: The new state after the event.

fields.name: event-values
fields.description: Optional additional parameters for the event.
